-   Definition: The definition of efficiency is the ability to do or produce something while minimizing the amount of wasted resources or effort.

-   Efficiency in Stat Computing/ Data S: In the field of statistical computing and data science, efficiency is the reduction of repetition and the use of concise yet effective code to produce valuable insights without wasting time and effort.
